sources.title: Duel in the Sun (1946)
sources.description: Beautiful half-breed Pearl Chavez becomes the ward of her dead father's first love and finds herself torn between her sons, one good and the other bad. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/duel-in-the-sun-1946/

metadata.Plot: When her father is hanged for shooting his wife and her lover, the biracial Pearl Chavez goes to live with distant relatives in Texas. Welcomed by Laura Belle and her elder lawyer son Jesse, she meets with hostility from the ranch-owner himself, wheelchair-bound Senator Jackson McCanles, and with lustful interest from demonizing, unruly younger son Lewt. Almost at once, already existing family tensions are exacerbated by her presence and the way she is physically drawn to Lewt.
metadata.Director: King Vidor, Otto Brower, William Dieterle
metadata.Writer: David O. Selznick, Niven Busch, Oliver H.P. Garrett
metadata.Actors: Jennifer Jones, Joseph Cotten, Gregory Peck
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 3 wins & 4 nominations total
